sentence.Network_en: Adolescent suicide is rarely an impulsive reaction to immediate distress.
sentence.Network_cn: 青少年自杀很少是由于突然发生不幸而作出的冲动反应。

sentence.Network_en: A spoilt child is rarely popular with other children.
sentence.Network_cn: 被宠坏的孩子很难得到其他孩子的喜爱。

sentence.Network_en: His face and movements rarely betrayed a sign of nerves.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的表情和行为几乎没有流露出紧张的迹象。

entry.def: If something rarely happens, it does not happen very often.

example.ex: They battled against other Indian tribes, but rarely fought with the whites...
example.tran: 他们同其他印第安部落作战，但很少与白人并肩对敌。

example.ex: I very rarely wear a raincoat because I spend most of my time in a car...
example.tran: 我难得穿一次雨衣，因为大部分时间我都是呆在车里。

auth_sentence.content: This is a mild form and rarely causes disability.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is a mild form and rarely causes disability.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is a mild form and rarely causes disability.

auth_sentence.content: Yet The Undertones were always likeable and rarely boring.
auth_sentence.res_content: Yet The Undertones were always likeable and rarely boring.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Yet The Undertones were always likeable and rarely boring.

auth_sentence.content: Rarely, surgery may be needed to treat vertigo.
auth_sentence.res_content: Rarely, surgery may be needed to treat vertigo.

Sentence.sentence: Such books, which only rarely end up in permanent collections, either private or public, will probably only be available as e-books within a few years.
Energy independence" and its rhetorical (修辞的) companion "energy security" are, however, slippery concepts that are rarely though through
Very rarely do any violent crimes actually occur.
Talent,charm,and an exceptional work ethic have rarely hurled any one of world's most successful entertainment icons and the first African-American female billionaire.
Although most people admitted to some lingering rivalry, it was rarely strong enough to end the relationship.
A father who is rarely at home because he's always working sends the message that men are supposed to earn money.

means.word_mean: 不常, 很少地, 难得地

sentences.en: She rarely went anywhere except to her office.
sentences.cn: 她除了去办公室以外, 很少去别的地方。

jushi.english: She rarely went anywhere except to her office.
jushi.chinese: 她除了去办公室以外,很少去别的地方。

jushi.english: He rarely, if ever, goes out.
I rarely make spelling mistakes in my composition.
jushi.chinese: 我很少在作文中犯拼写错误。
